query.pigql: q = load "${App.Datasets.opportunity_products_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; q = filter q by 'Opportunity_IsWon' == "true"; q = group q by {{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, "value").asGrouping()}}; FINAL = foreach q generate {{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, "value").asGrouping()}} as {{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, "value").asGrouping()}}, coalesce(sum('TotalPrice'), 0) as 'sum_TotalPrice'; FINAL = order FINAL by 'sum_TotalPrice' desc;

q = load "${App.Datasets.opportunity_products_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; q = filter q by 'Opportunity_IsWon' == "true"; q = group q by ('Opportunity_CloseDate_Year', 'Opportunity_CloseDate_Quarter'); q = foreach q generate 'Opportunity_CloseDate_Year' + "~~~" + 'Opportunity_CloseDate_Quarter' as 'Opportunity_CloseDate_Year~~~Opportunity_CloseDate_Quarter', sum('TotalPrice') as 'TotalPrice', sum(sum('TotalPrice')) over ([ - 4.. - 4] partition by all order by ('Opportunity_CloseDate_Year', 'Opportunity_CloseDate_Quarter')) as 'last'; q = foreach q generate 'Opportunity_CloseDate_Year~~~Opportunity_CloseDate_Quarter' as'Opportunity_CloseDate_Year~~~Opportunity_CloseDate_Quarter', (sum('TotalPrice') - sum('last')) / sum('last') as 'sum_QoQ'; q = offset q 4;

content.displayTemplate: Analyze sales performance by product, source, customer, and region.
